citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The written program of veterinary care states adult dogs shall be given Heartgard or Interceptor monthly from May
through December as a preventative for Heartworm disease. Licensee compounds ivermectin to give orally, but hasn't
treated the dogs since June. Heartworm disease in dogs can be severe and life threatening. Licensee shall assure that
the attending veterinarian has appropriate authority to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee
the adequacy of other aspects of animal care and use. Licensee must follow veterinary guidance exactly. Correct by
November 15, 2022
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The written program of veterinary care states adult dogs shall be given Heartgard or Interceptor monthly from May 
through December as a preventative for Heartworm disease.  Licensee compounds ivermectin to give orally, but hasn't 
treated the dogs since June.  Heartworm disease in dogs can be severe and life threatening.  Licensee shall assure that 
the attending veterinarian has appropriate authority to ensure the provision of adequate veterinary care and to oversee 
the adequacy of other aspects of animal care and use.  Licensee must follow veterinary guidance exactly.  Correct by 
November 15, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee. 
 
 n
